name: CHAOSTALE
description:
Welcome to CHAOSTALE!

This AU is very different compared to the original Undertale (By toby fox).

Here are a few examples:

Instead of using arrow keys to move, you use WASD!

Characters are VERY violent. (just a way of saying its kinda hard)

Most characters have multiple phases.

and more!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If  you are having difficulties, just press "M" or click the yellow button to activate practice mode!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So far you can only install phase 1-2 of Sans.

Enjoy, and remember to stay determined.
